00030 #define CELCHECK_H

00039 #include <map>
00040 #include "Util.h"

00044 #include "StringUtils.h"

00046 using namespace std;
00047 using namespace affymetrix_fusion_io;
00048 
00054 class CelCheck : public RegressionCheck {
00055 
00056 public:
00057 
00067   CelCheck(std::vector<std::string> &generated,
00068            std::vector<std::string> &gold, 
00069            double eps, 
00070            const std::string &prefix="affymetrix-", 
00071            int diffAllowed=0) {
00072     m_Generated = generated;
00073     m_Gold = gold;
00074     m_Eps = eps;
00075     m_Prefix = prefix;
00076     m_DiffAllowed = diffAllowed;
00077   }
00078 
00084   bool check(std::string &msg) {
00085     bool success = true;
00086     if(m_Generated.size() != m_Gold.size()) {
00087       return checkMsg(false, "CelCheck::check() - generated and gold vectors must be same size.",msg);
00088     }
00089     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Generated.size(); i++) {
00090         try {
00091             m_Generated[i] = Util::getPathName(m_Generated[i].c_str());
00092             m_Gold[i] = Util::getPathName(m_Gold[i].c_str());
00093             if(!headersSame(m_Generated[i], m_Gold[i], msg))
00094                 success = false;
00095             if(!dataSame(m_Generated[i], m_Gold[i], msg)) {
00096                 success = false;
00097             }
00098         } // end try
00099         catch(Except &e) {
00100             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: " + ToStr(e.what()),msg);
00101         }
00102         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00103             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: AGCC library exception: " + 
00104                             StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()),msg);
00105         }
00106         catch(const std::exception &e) {
00107             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: standard exception: " + ToStr(e.what()),msg);
00108         }
00109         catch(...) {
00110             success &= checkMsg(false, "Error: Uncaught Exception.",msg);
00111         }
00112     }
00113     return success;
00114   }
00115 
00116 private:
00117   
00118   static void fillInToIgnore(std::set<std::string> &ignoreMap, const std::string &prefix) {
00119     ignoreMap.clear();
00120     ignoreMap.insert("analysis-guid");
00121   }
00122 
00123   bool headersSame(const std::string &generated, const std::string &gold, std::string &msgs) {
00125     return true;
00126   }
00127 
00128   bool dataSame(const std::string &generated, const std::string &gold, std::string &msgs) {
00129     bool success = true;
00130     double maxDiff = -1;
00131     int numDiff = 0;
00132     FusionCELData generatedCel, goldCel;
00133 
00134     goldCel.SetFileName (gold.c_str());
00135     if (! goldCel.Read()) {
00136       msgs += "Can't read cel file: " + ToStr(gold);
00137       return false;
00138     }
00139     generatedCel.SetFileName (generated.c_str());
00140     if (! generatedCel.Read()) {
00141       msgs += "Can't read cel file: " + ToStr(generated);
00142       return false;
00143     }
00144     const int numCells = goldCel.GetNumCells();
00145     for (int celIx = 0; celIx < numCells; celIx++) {
00146       bool localSuccess = true;
00147       checkFloat(goldCel.GetIntensity(celIx), generatedCel.GetIntensity(celIx), m_Eps, localSuccess, maxDiff);
00148       if(!success) {
00149         numDiff++;
00150       }
00151       success &= localSuccess;
00152     }
00153 
00154     if(maxDiff > m_Eps) {
00155       Verbose::out(1, "Max diff: " + ToStr(maxDiff) + " is greater than expected (" + ToStr(m_Eps) + ")");
00156       Verbose::out(1, ToStr(numDiff) + " of " + ToStr(numCells) + " (" + 
00157                    ToStr(100.0 * numDiff/numCells) + "%) were different.");
00158     }
00159     if(!success && m_DiffAllowed >= numDiff) 
00160         success = true;
00161     if(!success) {
00162       msgs += "Error: " + generated + " is different from " + gold + ". ";
00163       
00164     }
00165     std::string res = "different";
00166     if(success) 
00167         res = "same";
00168     Verbose::out(1, generated + ToStr(" chip is ") + res + " max diff is: " + ToStr(maxDiff));
00169     return success;
00170   }
00171       
00172   std::vector<std::string> m_Generated;
00173   std::vector<std::string> m_Gold;
00174   double m_Eps;
00175   std::string m_Prefix;
00176   int m_DiffAllowed;
00177 };
00178 
00179 #endif /* CELCHECK_H */
